1.details: Analyze all 92 database tables, identify security vulnerabilities, missing RLS policies, orphaned relationships, and performance issues. Review foreign key constraints and data integrity.

2.details: Audit all React components in claim intake wizards, forms, UI elements. Identify broken functionality, missing features, validation issues, and inconsistent UX patterns.

3.details: Review Supabase RLS policies, user permissions, role-based access control, and identify security gaps. Ensure proper data isolation between organizations.

4.details: Audit all Supabase edge functions, API endpoints, error handling, rate limiting, and integration points. Check for deprecated or broken functionality.

5.details: Evaluate design system consistency, accessibility compliance, responsive design issues, and user experience problems across all interfaces.

6.details: Identify performance bottlenecks, database query optimization opportunities, frontend bundle size issues, and caching strategies.

7.details: Review form validation rules, data type constraints, required field enforcement, and business logic validation across all forms and workflows.

8.details: Review Google Maps API integration, PDF processing services, AI/ML integrations, email services, and external API dependencies.

9.details: Assess code documentation, TypeScript type safety, component organization, naming conventions, and maintainability issues.

10.details: Compile all findings into prioritized action plan with timeline estimates, resource requirements, and implementation strategies for each identified issue.
